channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache James Mime4J
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache James Mime4J

item.title: CVE-2022-45787|2024-08-03T14:17:04.186Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20james%20mime4j
item.description:
Unproper laxist permissions on the temporary files used by MIME4J TempFileStorageProvider may lead to information disclosure to other local users. This issue affects Apache James MIME4J version 0.8.8 and prior versions.
We recommend users to upgrade to MIME4j version 0.8.9 or later.

item.title: CVE-2024-21742|2024-06-04T17:37:41.315Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20james%20mime4j
item.description: Improper input validation allows for header injection in MIME4J library when using MIME4J DOM for composing message. This can be exploited by an attacker to add unintended headers to MIME messages.

item.title: CVE-2024-21742|2024-08-01T22:27:36.169Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20james%20mime4j
item.description: Improper input validation allows for header injection in MIME4J library when using MIME4J DOM for composing message. This can be exploited by an attacker to add unintended headers to MIME messages.
